$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-in.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/readme
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-in.text:
* Show Tiddler Info
* note: reoverwrite [[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle]] tiddler

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-in.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/icon
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-in.text: <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" version="1" viewBox="0 0 48 48" enable-background="new 0 0 48 48" height="1em" width="1em" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><circle fill="#2196F3" cx="24" cy="24" r="21"></circle><rect x="22" y="22" fill="#fff" width="4" height="11"></rect><circle fill="#fff" cx="24" cy="16.5" r="2.5"></circle></svg>

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-in.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/info-config
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-in.text:
\define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config
Change Emoji Icon
created <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="ocreated" placeholder="👉" tag="input"/>
modified <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="omodified" placeholder="📝" tag="input"/>
description <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="odescription" placeholder="✅" tag="input"/>
tags <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="otags" placeholder="🏷️" tag="input"/>
username <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="ousername" placeholder="username" tag="input"/>
user image <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="ouserimage" placeholder="gravatar.png" tag="input"/>

$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle.title: $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle
$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle.text:
\define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="hide" tag="div" retain="yes" animate="yes">
<$list filter="[all[current]has[creator]]"> <$avatar inline link="https://github.com/oeyoews" /> {{!!creator}}  <$list filter="[all[current]has[created]]"> <$text text={{{[get[ocreated]else[👉]]}}} /> created <$view field="created" format="date" template="YYYY/0MM/0DD"/>   <$list filter="[all[current]has[modified]]"> <$text text={{{[get[omodified]else[📝]]}}} /> modified <$view field="modified" format="relativedate" />   <$list filter="[all[current]has[description]]"> <$text text={{{[get[odescription]else[✅]]}}} /> {{!!description}}    <$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]!is[binary]]"> <> <$set name='type' value={{!!type}}> <% if [match[text/markdown]] %> <$iconify icon="skill-icons:markdown-dark" /> <% elseif [match[text/vnd.tiddlywiki]] %> <$iconify icon="simple-icons:tiddlywiki" /> <% elseif [match[application/javascript]] %> <$iconify icon="skill-icons:javascript" /> <% elseif [match[image/png]] %> <$iconify icon="vscode-icons:file-type-image" /> <% elseif [match[application/json]] %> <$iconify icon="carbon:json" /> <% else %> <% endif %> <$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]]"> <$select tiddler=<> field='type' default='text/markdown' class="lowercase appearance-none border-none m-0 bg-gray-100 dark:bg-black rounded p-0.5"> <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/language/Docs/Types/]each[group]sort[group]]'> <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/language/Docs/Types/]group{!!group}] +[sort[description]]'>

$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags.title: $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags
$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags.text: <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]limit[1]sort[title]]"> <$text text={{{ [[$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config]get[otags]else[🎯]] }}} /> <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]sort[title]]" template="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate" storyview="pop"/>

$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title.title: $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title
$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title.text:
\whitespace trim \define title-styles() fill:$(foregroundColor)$; \end
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewToolbar]!has[draft.of]] :filter[lookup[$:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/]!match[hide]]" storyview="pop" variable="listItem"><$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" filter="[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]"><$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value={{$:/config/Tiddlers/TitleLinks}}> <$link> <$list filter="[] :cascade[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerIconFilter]!is[draft]get[text]] +[!is[blank]]" variable="ignore"> <$let foregroundColor={{{ [] :cascade[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerColourFilter]!is[draft]get[text]] }}}> >> {{||$:/core/ui/TiddlerIcon}} <$transclude tiddler={{{ [] :cascade[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplateTitleFilter]!is[draft]get[text]] :and[!is[blank]else[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title/default]] }}} />
<$reveal type="nomatch" text="" default="" state=<> class="tc-tiddler-info tc-popup-handle" animate="yes" retain="yes"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerInfoSegment]!has[draft.of]] [[$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo]]" variable="listItem"><$transclude tiddler=<> mode="block"/>
